scripts.backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && gunicorn -c gunicorn_config.py main:app
